info.title: Verified
info.description: Connector for the Verified API to enable the creation of custom document signing processes.

post.description: Gets the authentication token from the Verified API.

get.description: Gets information of a given company.
Gets all recipients of a given envelope.

post.description: Adds a recipient to a given envelope.

get.summary: Get specific recipient for an envelope
get.description: Gets a specific recipient for a given envelope.
Gets the url to a given file.

parameters.name: asObject
parameters.description: Defines whether the response is an Object

get.description: Gets the settings of a given user.

parameters.name: user-id
parameters.description: ID of the user in question

get.description: Gets details of a given envelope.

put.description: Updates Settings of a given envelope.
Updates the publish status of a given envelope.

post.description: Generates a document from a preconfigured template.

parameters.name: template-id
parameters.description: The Id of the template which should be used

put.description: Sets the status of a given envelope to aborted.

get.description: Gets all files connected to a given document.

post.description: Adds a file to an existing document.

get.description: Gets information of the currently logged in user.

post.description: Sets the status of a given document to aborted.

get.description: Gets information of a given descriptor.

put.description: Sets the status of a given envelope to trashed.

get.description: Queries all envelopes matching a given filter.
Gets a list of all descriptors present in the current company. The list could be filtered.

get.summary: Get flow state by envelope id
get.description: Gets the current flow state of a given envelope.

parameters.name: flow-id
parameters.description: Id of the flow in question

get.description: Gets information of a given document.

post.description: Creates an envelope based on a specific descriptor.

get.summary: Get all documents by envelope id
get.description: Gets all documents related to a given envelope.

post.description: Adds a new document to an existing envelope.
Creates a signature link. Implementation is flow specific and may be missing for your specific flow.

redirectTo.description: Full URL to redirect the user to after sign.
redirectTo.title: Redirect To

get.description: Gets information about a given file.

post.description: Creates a new envelope using the default descriptor.

get.description: Gets the default descriptor for envelopes.

post.description: Sends a notification to recepients of a given envelope.

id.description: The ID of the recipient the notification should be send to.
id.title: Recipient Id

action.description: Verified's name of the action a recipient should execute.
action.title: Action

label.description: Label for the role/action of a recipient
label.title: Label

name.description: Verified name of the role of a recipient
name.title: Name

Token.name: token
Token.description: Token received from the 'Generate security token' action

XNamespace.name: x-namespace
XNamespace.description: The company ID which should be used for the action. Format: "/companies/<company id>. Defaults to connections company Id if not set.

EnvelopeId.name: envelope-id
EnvelopeId.description: Id of the envelope in question

RecipientId.name: recipient-id
RecipientId.description: The ID of the recipients in question

DocumentId.name: document-id
DocumentId.description: The ID of the document in question

FileId.name: file-id
FileId.description: The ID of the File in question

CompanyId.name: company-id
CompanyId.description: The ID of the company in question

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unknown error occurred
